title: Cognitive Load Theory-Based Craft Education e-Learning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and general understanding of craftsmanship
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment combining asynchronous learning via the Moodle platform with weekly intensive workshops

learning_goals: Learners can explain the principles of applying Cognitive Load Theory with 85% or higher accuracy.
Learners complete a 3-stage craft project using PBL (Problem-Based Learning) while applying cognitive load management strategies at each stage.
Learners achieve a feedback score of 4.0/5.0 or higher through peer evaluation.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
